DOC.brief_summary: AIM : To compare pain relief patient randomly assign endoscopic ultrasound-guided celiac ganglion block ( EUS-CGB ) v standard endoscopic ultrasound-guided celiac plexus block ( EUS-CPB ) . METHODS : This single-center , double-blind , randomize parallel-group study assess efficacy EUS-CPB vs. EUS-CGB patient painful chronic pancreatitis .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluate Endoscopic Ultrasound Guided Celiac Plexus Block Treatment Pain Chronic Pancreatitis
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion include : age > 18 yr , ability inform consent , chronic daily pancreatic-type abdominal pain . Exclusion criterion include : pregnancy , malignancy , recent acute pancreatitis ( within 2 month ) , elevate INR ( > 1.5 ) low platelet count ( < 75 cells/mm3 ) , allergy egg `` caine '' anesthetic .
